Title: He Never Died
Actors: Henry Rollins, Booboo Stewart, Kate Greenhouse, Jordan Todosey
Plot: Jack's in a rut. Depression and severe anti-social behavior has whittled down his existence to sleeping and watching television. He spends his days in a diner, playing church bingo and sleeping. When some hired thugs show up Jack's life is stirred up and the question of his existence comes to light.
